page.title: 04Kegworth Carnival.
page.content: {Kegworth carnival}is over 60 years old and is held every year in July. The {carnival}begins with a parade of decorated floats going through the village streets accompanied by a fancy dress competition.{Carnival Queen}is chosen and she rides in an{old steam {engined bus.}The parade ends at the {Flash.}Celebrations at the{Flash}last for 2 days on the first of which the {ox roast}takes place. The{ox}is spit roasted over an open fire, and is 1 of the highlights of the celebrations. There is a{central arena}where a range of activties takes place. There is a well known rally for{traction engines, a band competition and various novelty events. One year a lady was fired from a cannon and the{television cameras came to film the event.In 1984 a car stunt took place, when an attempt to jump the river by car failed.
